scripts.lint: node ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint . --max-warnings=0 && echo 'âœ”  Your code looks good.'
scripts.build-doc: npm install phantomjs && npm install -g wiki2pdf && wiki2pdf ./design --title Common_Cloud_Core --format all --footer ./design/_footer.html
scripts.deploy: npm run-script deploy-apps && docker stack deploy --compose-file=./deploy/docker-compose-dev.yaml caade-dev
scripts.deploy-test: npm run-script deploy-apps && docker stack deploy --compose-file=./deploy/docker-compose-test.yaml caade-test
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run-script deploy-apps && docker stack deploy --compose-file=./deploy/docker-compose-prod.yaml caade
